Description.Text: The Riviera was formerly the Vista Blanca, a well known hotel situated close to the Levante beach and the main Tourist area of Benidorm. The hotel has been totally refurbished to an exceptionally high standard and now is a four star property. The Hotel has a 24 hour reception, swimming pool, buffet restaurant, bar, entertainment, kids playground and pool. All rooms have balcony, air conditioning/heating, satelite/cable TV, telephone, en suite bathroom with hairdryer and a rental safety deposit box. The hotel provides an excellent base to enjoy all that Benidorm has to offer.
